fullplot: A portrait of a fictional town in the mid west that is home to a group of idiosyncratic and slightly neurotic characters. Dwayne Hoover is a wealthy car dealer-ship owner that's on the brink of suicide and is losing touch with reality.

title: Breakfast of Champions

tomatoes.consensus: The movie is overwhelmed by its chaotic visual effects and disjointed storyline.
